context: My Son told me I have to watch Ant-Man. Can you tell me more about it?

I have not, tell me more about TI, I know TI was in the action movie Takers.
T. I. also starred in American Gangster. That's a good movie.
That sounds like a good movie. I think Ruby Dee was in that too. I like crime movies too.
resp: I love Crime movies! Ruby Dee also starred in The Way Back Home and The Tall Target. If you like horror, she also starred in The Stand.
